top_comments.comment: Looks like some kind of crazy chalk cliffs. Love it

I absolutely love Ren's intros. I think it just might be my favourite yter intro.
It just gets me so hyped for the episode!

comments_since_last_sample.body: Id recomend moving the pay barrel to the floor, as people have a tendency to not look up. also id recommend taking the diamond of the barrel so it looks less like a display
